name: dronesmart
description: A tech hobby and drone online web store made with Node.js and Express.js on the backend, leveraging a JSON flat file data-store. Shopping cart uses Stripe for payment processing.  Front-end built with React.js, React Router, and Bulma CSS.
author: Ryan Hunter | GitHub handle : systemsvanguard. Web: www.RyanHunter.org . Email: ryan@RyanHunter.org | Based in Brampton ON Canada in the Greater Toronto Area.
